name: JP Asia Capital Partners
overview: JP Asia Capital is a Singapore-based private equity fund manager focusing on investment opportunities in Asia. Through our initial fund, JP Asia Capital Partners, we seek to acquire meaningful equity stakes in high-growth, technology-enabled companies. We believe that building partnerships with strong management teams is key to enhancing and unlocking value. Working closely with the executives of portfolio companies, JP Asia Capital seeks to maximize value and thus deliver strong returns to investors. With our principalsâ€™ strong track record in direct investments and building strong business franchises, combined with our extensive network of industrial and financial contacts, JP Asia Capital is able to contribute significantly to the growth of prospective portfolio companies. JP Asia Capital works closely with Tinicum Capital Partners, a New York-based private equity firm with US$1.2 billion in capital under management. Through our association with Tinicum, we are capable of acquiring significant positions in promising companies.
